install_msg: Thank you for installing my repo! If you need support, ping me in the [`Red Cog Support`]( https://discord.gg/GET4DVk ) server. You can get help on any cogs and any repos in [`#support_othercogs`](https://discord.com/channels/240154543684321280/240212783503900673).
